‎我们表达了我们的担心

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.zh: ‎我们会击败制造爆炸事件的凶手

translation.zh: ‎我们没有具体证据证明是哪个团体

translation.zh: ‎极右组织 针对少数族群下手

translation.zh: ‎我和亚瑟见面 地点选在

translation.zh: ‎我最后一次见到他是在年度集会上

translation.zh:
‎他戴着招待员的袖标

translation.en: I think Tyndall got quite badly beaten up by anti-fascists.
translation.zh: ‎我想丁达尔被反法西斯人士给揍了

translation.zh: ‎不 没问题 但这事让你气愤

translation.zh: ‎我记得我去了一家画廊 然后我回家

translation.zh: ‎周末假期开始了 天气好极了

translation.zh: ‎人们开始下班 都喜气洋洋的

‎我从那里经过 我想：

translation.zh:
‎我几乎立刻想到

translation.zh: ‎然后 我在探照灯的联络人打来电话

translation.zh: ‎我们开始检索我们自己的记录

translation.zh: ‎在那里面我们找到了科普兰的名字

translation.zh: ‎他参加过多次不同的会议和各种活动

translation.zh: ‎于是 一个同事联系了警方

translation.zh:
‎我看看表

translation.zh:
‎我在电话亭旁边等着

ten to six.

When I was in there, I seen the people I was gonna maim and kill.
translation.zh:
‎在酒吧里 我看到那些

translation.en: I didn't feel joy about it.
I didn't feel sad.
I just didn't feel anything.

[Johnstone] Is that right? You had a glass of Coke or something?

translation.zh:
‎我把它放在那里

translation.en: [Johnstone] And this is just as you left, was it now?
-[David] Yeah. -[Johnstone] Yeah.

translation.zh: ‎当你把包放下时 酒吧里

translation.en: when you actually put the bag down? Do you remember?
translation.zh: ‎究竟有多少人 你记得吗？

translation.zh: ‎我得绕着人走 请他们借光

translation.en: I knew that people would be killed, but I had to do it.
translation.zh:
‎我知道有人会被炸死

translation.zh: ‎我看看本来放着酒具的那边

and nobody.

translation.zh: ‎我看不见任何人 听不见任何声音

and then the next memory is of being…
looking up at a-- a young woman,
translation.zh: ‎抬起头 看见一个年轻姑娘

translation.zh:
‎我看见她的嘴一张一合
‎我想是在呼喊

translation.zh:
‎后来我听说 炸弹爆炸时
‎你的耳鼓会被震坏

translation.zh: ‎我想我是被拖出去的 那里有个人

translation.zh: ‎他和我在一起 他说我在对他讲话

translation.zh: ‎我都不记得了 一点也不记得

translation.zh: ‎他们不知道我能不能活下来

translation.zh: ‎他们调节止疼药水平的时候

translation.zh:
‎梦见我在一家夜总会

translation.zh: ‎老鼠 老鼠 更多的老鼠

translation.zh: ‎后来我听说 科普兰有老鼠

translation.zh:
‎他让它们在他用来装填钉子炸弹
‎的东西上面跑来跑去

translation.en: And, um, so, from what I can tell,  the guys that were in the same hospital as me,
translation.zh: ‎据我所知 和我在同一家医院的人

translation.en: um, we all got these weird infections,
translation.zh: ‎我们都得了一种奇怪的感染

translation.en: and they couldn't figure out what was wrong with us.
And it was all because he let these rats…
you know, like, urinate and defecate
translation.zh: ‎在他用来装填炸药的东西上面

[man 6] As these patients came in one at a time,

translation.zh: ‎我们开始意识到情况有多严重

unconscious,
one after another.

translation.zh:
‎我的职业生涯中处理过的

translation.zh: ‎可能就是救治一个昏迷的伤员

translation.zh: ‎我们意识到 我们得对他讲

translation.zh: ‎很不幸 他妻子和未出世的孩子

translation.zh: ‎据透露 此次爆炸案的三名死者中

translation.zh: ‎有一名孕妇和她结婚时的伴郎

translation.zh: ‎她丈夫朱利安 在医院抢救 伤势严重

translation.en: I can't picture what you look like. Please send me a picture.
translation.zh:
‎我无法想象你长什么样
‎请给我一张照片吧

so I invented this girl called Patsy Scanlon.
translation.zh:
‎所以我虚构了一个
‎叫帕西斯坎隆的女孩

translation.en: Patsy was like these girls you see
translation.zh: ‎帕西像是那种你在20世纪40年代

translation.en: in the 1940s propaganda films.
You know, she's lithe, blonde, beautiful.
translation.zh: ‎体态曼妙 金色头发 很美丽

translation.en: Someone who'll do what they're told without question.
translation.zh: ‎很顺从 让干什么就干什么

translation.en: Someone who's vulnerable.
Totally airhead, do you know what I mean?
translation.zh: ‎完全无脑 你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: I knew he'd go for that one million percent.
I just knew it.
[reporter 10] For the survivors, it was a day of harrowing evidence.
translation.zh:
‎对科普兰爆炸案受害者来说
‎当天呈现的证据令他们无比痛苦

translation.en: As the horrific injuries caused by the explosions were described,
translation.zh: ‎当庭描述了爆炸造成的可怕伤害

translation.en: several people were visibly distressed.
translation.zh: ‎其中几个人的痛苦之情溢于言表

translation.en: The trial was about whether he was mad or bad,
translation.zh: ‎审判围绕着他究竟是疯还是坏

translation.en: and he had a barrage of lawyers.
He had, you know, more on-- on his side
than what were on the other side, than the-- than the Crown.
[reporter 10] David Copeland pleaded not guilty to murder,
translation.zh: ‎出于责任能力减弱原则 大卫科普兰

translation.en: but said instead he was guilty of manslaughter
because of diminished responsibility.
It's now for the jury to decide his state of mind.
translation.zh: ‎现在将由陪审团决定他的精神状态

translation.en: [man 14] Essentially, what I needed was a smoking gun.
translation.zh: ‎说到底 我需要真凭实据

translation.en: I needed him to say, you know, something
that showed he was playing a game with the doctors,
but I didn't have a lot of time to get him.
translation.zh: ‎但我没有多少时间抓到他的把柄了

translation.en: [Patsy] Dear David,
I hope you're not too worried about your trial.
translation.zh: ‎希望你不会太担心你的审判

translation.en: It must be a stressful time for you.
[David] Dear Patsy,
you are a very attractive young lady.
Oh, you know.
My plan was to build Copeland up.
By doing that, get him to open up.
[Patsy] I hope you're feeling confident and thinking positive thoughts.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你有信心 乐观一些

translation.en: [David] It feels strange being famous.
[Patsy] Dear David,
I saw your picture in the papers the other day.
translation.zh: ‎那天我在报上看到你的照片了

translation.en: Your mum is right. You really are handsome.
translation.zh: ‎你妈妈说得对 你的确很帅

translation.en: [David] Dear Patsy,
I can't get you out of my mind.
All I do is dream about you and when we can finally meet.
translation.zh: ‎我每天梦见你 想着何时能与你见面

translation.en: And he signed that "Love, Dave," which was an escalation of things, really.
translation.zh:
‎落款是“爱你的戴夫”
‎说明关系升级了

translation.en: The whole mood of Copeland's letters changed.
[David] Dear Patsy…
[man 14] I had a… a flurry of letters at that point.
[David] Your letters are the only things that are keeping me going here.
translation.zh: ‎你的信是唯一让我坚持下去的东西

translation.en: I lie on my bed at night and think of you.
translation.zh: ‎晚上我躺在床上 想着你

translation.en: Promise me, Patsy, you'll never forget about me.
translation.zh:
‎请答应我 帕西 你永远不会忘记我
‎希望很快能听到你的消息

translation.en: -Hope I'll hear from you soon. -[man 14] Then, finally, I had him.
translation.zh:
‎请答应我 帕西 你永远不会忘记我
‎希望很快能听到你的消息 ‎他终于上钩了

translation.en: [David] Dear Patsy, this place is a joke.
translation.zh: ‎亲爱的帕西 这地方荒唐可笑

translation.en: So are the doctors.
They think they're clever,
but they're as stupid as the fools in here.
Things are not looking too bad for my trial.
I can't believe that I fooled all the doctors.
translation.zh: ‎真不敢相信我骗过了所有医生

translation.en: "I can't believe that I have fooled all the doctors."
translation.zh: ‎“真不敢相信我骗过了所有医生”

translation.en: The jury looked at the correspondence in its entirety.
translation.zh: ‎陪审团看了所有的往来信件

translation.en: Saw it as I saw it. Saw it as the psychiatrist saw it.
translation.zh:
‎凡我看到的他们都看到了
‎心理专家也看到了

translation.en: There's absolutely nothing wrong with him.
Copeland was showed photographs of these horrific injuries
translation.zh:
‎他们给科普兰看了那些照片
‎显示他给受害者

translation.en: and all the misery and pain he'd caused,
and not once did he show a sign of emotion.
But then when the prosecutor read out
that, um, the girl he wanted to marry
was actually a… an hairy-arsed bouncer from Essex called Bernie,
translation.zh:
‎其实是埃塞克斯一个
‎一身毛的夜店保安 名叫伯尼

translation.en: you know, he put his head in his hands and slumped in the dock.
translation.zh: ‎他双手抱头 摊在了被告席上

translation.en: You know, his-- his world ended.
[reporter 11] David Copeland, the young fanatic
translation.zh:
‎晚上好 在伦敦制造了
‎三起钉子炸弹事件的狂热分子

translation.en: who worshiped Adolf Hitler and planted nail bombs across London,
translation.zh: ‎希特勒的崇拜者大卫科普兰

translation.en: is in Broadmoor tonight starting six life sentences.
translation.zh:
‎今晚开始在布罗德莫服刑
‎他被判处六个终身监禁

translation.en: He was convicted of murdering three people and injuring nearly 150 others
translation.zh:
‎他被裁定针对黑人与同性恋群体
‎制造爆炸事件

translation.en: in a bombing campaign that targeted Blacks and homosexuals.
translation.zh: ‎谋杀三人 致伤近150人 罪名成立

translation.en: The jury rejected his plea
that he wasn't responsible for his actions.
translation.zh:
‎缺乏责任能力的辩护
‎陪审团予以驳回

translation.en: [reporter 12] For two of the survivors, a poignant moment outside the Old Bailey.
translation.zh:
‎对于老贝利街 ‎法院门外的两位幸存者来说
‎这是个沉痛的时刻

translation.en: David Copeland has not achieved his aims of fame and power.
translation.zh:
‎大卫科普兰没有出名
‎也没有获得力量

translation.en: Today's verdict prove he-- proves he is a dangerous, pathetic nobody
translation.zh:
‎今天的判决证明了 他就是一个
‎危险又可悲的小人物

translation.en: who is now where he belongs.
-Thanks, fellas. -[reporter 13] Thanks.
Everybody was saying, "Come on, we'll go out for a drink" and "Yeah."
translation.zh:
‎大家都说：“来吧 我们去喝一杯”
‎“好啊”

translation.en: And I can remember thinking… [scoffs] "Nothing to celebrate here. Really."
translation.zh:
‎我记得我当时想：
‎“没什么值得庆祝的 真的”

translation.en: [man 18] Oh, beautiful.
To new beginnings.
[man 16] I've always had this real overwhelming sense of, um,
what a bloody waste.
What a waste of human life.
His included.
'Cause he'll never get out, he'll never be any use to anybody.
translation.zh:
‎因为他永远出不来了
‎他再也不会是个有用之人

translation.en: And what he's done to all these people, you know?
translation.zh: ‎而他对我们所有人的所作所为呢？

translation.en: Hundreds and hundreds of people.
[Arthur] I wish…
I wish we'd been able to stop it.
translation.zh: ‎要是我们当时能不让它发生该多好

translation.en: Just, like, stop those people from being killed and injured.
[man 1] So, there's some sort of guilt that exists, is there?
translation.zh: ‎所以有一种愧疚感 是不是？

translation.en: [Arthur] Yeah. Yeah, definitely. Definitely. Definitely.
I think about that a lot.
I thought I'd got over it. [laughing] And then it came back.
translation.zh: ‎我以为都过去了 可是我又会想起来

translation.en: I, you know, well--
Joining the BNP, I wanted, like, the excitement of, like, being a spy and…
translation.zh:
‎潜入英国国家党
‎我想要体验做间谍的刺激

translation.en: all that, and, like, taking on, like, the bad people.
But when something on that scale happened,
translation.zh: ‎但是 当那种规模的事件发生

translation.en: I wish-- I wish we'd been able to stop what happened sooner.
translation.zh:
‎我希望…如果我们能够更早地
‎阻止它就好了

translation.en: Yep.
[man 12] Arthur was someone who was motivated by doing something good.
At the time, there was a reward. There was a reward put out by the police.
translation.zh: ‎当时有悬赏 警方开出赏金

translation.en: Seventy-thousand pounds for his identification.
translation.zh: ‎能指认凶手的话 可得七万英镑

translation.en: Arthur was never interested in a penny.
And even now. I mean-- There were some people in his family,
translation.zh: ‎就是现在 他家里有些人

translation.en: only on the 20th anniversary of the London nail bombings
translation.zh: ‎直到伦敦钉子炸弹事件整整20年后

translation.en: that some of his family found out what-- what he had done.
That he wasn't a Nazi after all.
translation.zh: ‎才知道他其实不是纳粹分子

translation.en: Arthur had been inside for 10 years,
you know, week in, week out, going to British National Party meetings,
translation.zh: ‎每周去参加英国国家党大会

translation.en: being chased down the street by anti-fascists,
translation.zh: ‎在街上被反法西斯人士追逐

translation.en: being attacked by anti-fascists,
going to concerts with Nazis,
and he'd done all of this and--
Of course, you know, he did far more than just identify Copeland.
translation.zh:
‎而且当然了
‎他做的不只是指认了科普兰

translation.en: He played a major role
in the British National Party not building on their successes in East London.
translation.zh:
‎东伦敦胜利的基础上继续发展壮大
‎这有他很大的功劳

translation.en: Tyndall failed to take hold across the country because of Arthur.
translation.zh:
‎因为亚瑟 丁达尔
‎没能在全国范围内站稳脚

translation.en: The police say that the BNP presence does introduce an element of racial tension--
translation.zh:
‎警方说 英国国家党的存在带来了
‎一定程度的种族主义矛盾…

translation.en: Oh, "The police say, the police say, the police say."
-So you don't believe them. -No, we don't accept it at all.
translation.zh:
‎-你不相信他们的说法
‎-不 我们完全不接受

translation.en: And you don't accept the courts and the convictions that your members have.
translation.zh: ‎你也不接受法庭对你们党成员的判决

translation.en: I've told you before,
our members have no greater proportion
translation.zh: ‎我们党员中犯罪判刑的比例

translation.en: of convictions than any other party members.
Okay. Thanks very much.
Right. Get your stuff out of here with the minimum delay.
translation.zh: ‎好 拿上你们的东西 不要耽搁

translation.en: You people are true to form.
You're exactly the way that, uh, we've learned to expect, and…
translation.zh:
‎我们学会了预判你们的行为
‎而你们总是不出所料…

translation.en: [activist] They're trying to drive us apart,
and the message we're giving them here today,
that it's the reverse effect.
We're coming together!
-In a way you've never seen us before! -[crowd cheering]
Let's march to fulfill this day!
translation.zh: ‎让我们为了这一天的目标前进吧！

translation.en: I think that someone like Copeland,
translation.zh: ‎我想 像科普兰这样的人

translation.en: someone trying to do what Copeland did, will never succeed.
translation.zh:
‎一个想要干科普兰那种勾当的人
‎永远也不会成功

translation.en: What gives me hope
is that there are still more good people than bad people.
And-- and the haters can never win.
In the long-- in the long term, the haters can ne-- can never win.
translation.zh:
‎从长远来看 心怀仇恨的人
‎永远赢不了

translation.en: And it must be… it must be horrible to be consumed with hate.
translation.zh: ‎被仇恨吞噬的感觉一定很可怕

translation.en: You know?
Think about all the things you can't enjoy 'cause, you know, you're full of hate.
translation.zh:
‎想想所有那些你无法享受的东西
‎就因为你的心里充满了仇恨
